comment: Seja o mestre do seu corao e no faa do corao o seu mestre. Be the master of your heart and do not make the heart your master. - Heisei Shimpen Gosho -
amr:
# ::snt Seja o mestre do seu corao e no faa do corao o seu mestre. Be the master of your heart and do not make the heart your master. - Heisei Shimpen Gosho -
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / become-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :ARG2 (m2 / master
                        :mod (h / heart)
                        :poss y))
            :op2 (m3 / make-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (m4 / master
                        :mod h)))
      :snt2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Heisei"
                        :op2 "Shimpen"
                        :op3 "Gosho"))
            :ARG1 a
            :op1 (b2 / become-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you
                        :part (h2 / heart))
                  :ARG2 (m5 / master
                        :mod h2))
            :op2 (b3 / become-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG1 y2
                  :ARG2 m5)))

comment: Don't tell me what to do
amr:
# ::snt Don't tell me what to do
(t / tell-01
      :polarity -
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (t2 / thing
            :ARG1-of (d / do-02
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)))
      :ARG2 ii)

comment: It is an inspirational comment meant to encourage, if you do not like it, please move along
amr:
# ::snt It is an inspirational comment meant to encourage, if you do not like it, please move along
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / mean-02
            :ARG0 (ii / it)
            :ARG1 (e / encourage-01
                  :ARG0 ii))
      :snt2 (m3 / move-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (a / along)
            :condition (d / dislike-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / it))))

comment: Please don't use hateful words, please use your words or else removal will take place
amr:
# ::snt Please don't use hateful words, please use your words or else removal will take place
(o / or
      :op1 (u / use-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :ARG1-of (h / hate-01)))
      :op2 (u2 / use-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (w2 / word
                  :poss y))
      :op3 (r / remove-01
            :ARG1 y
            :mod (e / else)))

comment: Using words that offend certain sexual orientations are not socially acceptable and should never be used in any context.
amr:
# ::snt Using words that offend certain sexual orientations are not socially acceptable and should never be used in any context.
(a / and
      :op1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a2 / accept-01
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 (w / word
                              :ARG0-of (o / offend-01
                                    :ARG1 (o2 / orient-01
                                          :ARG2 (s / sex)
                                          :mod (c / certain)))))
                  :manner (s2 / social)))
      :op2 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (u2 / use-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 w
                  :location (c2 / context
                        :mod (a3 / any))
                  :time (e / ever))))
